description:
Waiting, walking, and plain existing on frigid days, just got better. Designed for those winter days where you try to spend as little time outside as possible, the Maco offers knee-length protection from the elements. As part of Indyeva’s Cotton touch collection, the Maco is constructed from a hearty nylon, with a soft cottony feel. Insulated with a blend of plush down and lofty feathers. Extra puff has even added where you need it – shoulders, sleeves, and cuffs – it’s designed for warmth when it dips to -30°C. The waterproof-breathable laminate is totally windproof to buffer gusts when you turn the corner into a windy city street.

  • Bluesign® approved nylon fabric has a cotton-like feel
  • Waterproof-breathable laminate in 2-layer construction
  • Durable water repellent (DWR) finish to shed water and snow
  • Insulated with a blend of 700-fill power white duck down (80%) and feathers (20%) that are sourced under the Responsible Down Standard
  • High-pile fleece lining on the back and in the collar, helps hold on to your warmth
  • 2-way zipper opens from the bottom so you can sit down easily
  • Removable hood and a zippered expansion gusset at collar
  • Inside zippered pocket
  • Handwarmer pockets with fleece lining
  • Articulated sleeves and a tighter quilt pattern under the arms leave you free to move
  • Modern scooped silhouette (centre back length is 43in. and centre front length is 40in.)
name: Indyeva Maco Long Puffer Jacket - Women's

value: 700 fill-power goose down and feather blend
